hero.title: Dependency Security Health
hero.subtitle: Comprehensive dependency health analyzer for Node.js projects
hero.description: Analyze age, detect licenses, and assess security vulnerabilities in your dependencies - all in one tool.

ageDetection.title: Age Detection
ageDetection.description: Identify outdated dependencies and get recommendations for upgrades

licenseCompliance.title: License Compliance
licenseCompliance.description: Validate licenses against SPDX standards and commercial compatibility

security.title: Security Insights
security.description: Detect deprecated packages and security vulnerabilities

healthScore.title: Health Scoring
healthScore.description: Get an overall health score for your project dependencies

githubIntegration.title: GitHub Integration
githubIntegration.description: Analyze repository health, stars, forks, and maintenance status

reporting.title: Multiple Formats
reporting.description: Export reports in CLI, JSON, and CSV formats

installation.title: Installation
installation.description: Install globally via npm or use npx to run without installation

liveReport.title: Live Demo
liveReport.subtitle: Example analysis of this landing page's dependencies
liveReport.description: This is a demonstration of the analysis output. The actual tool generates reports in multiple formats:

formats.cli: CLI - Beautiful colored terminal output with tables and summaries
formats.json: JSON - Structured data perfect for CI/CD pipelines and automation
formats.csv: CSV - Spreadsheet-friendly format for data analysis and tracking

liveReport.noteDescription: This table shows a simplified view of the landing page's dependencies. Run the tool in your own project to get a complete analysis with detailed recommendations, security insights, and customizable output formats.

footer.description: Open source dependency health analyzer for Node.js projects
